subText.introSub: I'm a -years-old Self-Taught Graphic Designer & Front-End Developer!!
subText.techSub: A list of my favorite tools and technologies that I use on a regular basis.

aboutText.1: I am a 20 year old self-taught Graphic Designer & Front-End Web Developer, and now I am a final-year student pursuing a degree in Computer Science here in India. I am proficient in frontend development and graphic designing. Likewise, I have 5 years of experience in Graphic Designing & 2 years of experience in Front-End Development. I have built and maintained many websites for clients.
aboutText.2: I am passionate about the technology industry and want to get involved in new opportunities.
aboutText.3: Worked at Axionic Software for 1.5 Years as a Web Developer and Graphic Designer.
aboutText.4: Currently I am working as Web Developer at RichestSoft.
